  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon

    public class ZombieIntrinsicWeapon
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.IntrinsicWeapon
    Represents the intrinsic weapons of Zombie, e.g. punch, bite.
    Author:
    Kee Pei Jiin
